scripts.sam: pnpm run open:8000 & cd ./sam/ && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && sam run
scripts.open:8000: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const url='http://localhost:8000'; if(process.platform==='win32'){ spawn('cmd',['/c','start',url],{stdio:'inherit'}); } else if(process.platform==='darwin'){ spawn('open',[url],{stdio:'inherit'}); } else { spawn('xdg-open',[url],{stdio:'inherit'}); }"
scripts.sam:catalog: cd ./sam/ && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && sam plugin catalog
scripts.sam:agent: cd ./sam/ && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && sam add agent --gui
